issue.title: eu.ugreen.com
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Social Widget) [https://eu.ugreen.com/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Feu.ugreen.com%2F) ### Comment > Missed small ads and chat widget ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguardcdn.com/sitereports/5s8kdvpzabcwgsw8c4wc0cc4ggs4skgse6uekul574.jpg?nc=1)
### System configuration Information | Value --- | --- AdGuard product: | AdGuard for Mac v2.17.3.2020 release System version: | `MacOS 26.0.1 (Build 25A362)` Browser: | Safari Tracking protection: | **General settings**:
Block trackers,
Strip URLs from tracking parameters,
Hide your search queries,
Send Do-Not-Track header

**Tracking methods**:
Self-destructing third-party cookies (180),
Disable cache for third-party requests

**Browser API**:
Block WebRTC,
Block Push API,
Block Location API,
Block Java

**Miscellaneous**:
Hide your Referrer from third-parties,
Hide your User-Agent,
Hide your IP address (208.54.104.184),
Remove X-Client-Data header from HTTP requests,
Protect against DPI DNS filtering: | disabled Filters: | Ad blocking:
AdGuard Base,
AdGuard Mobile Ads,
EasyList

Privacy:
AdGuard Tracking Protection,
AdGuard URL Tracking,
EasyPrivacy,
Peter Lowe's Blocklist

Social widgets:
AdGuard Social Media,
Fanboy's Social Blocking List

Annoyances:
AdGuard Cookie Notices,
AdGuard Popups,
AdGuard Mobile App Banners,
AdGuard Other Annoyances,
AdGuard Widgets,
Adblock Warning Removal List,
EasyList Cookie List,
Dandelion Sprout's Annoyances List

Security:
Online Malicious URL Blocklist

Other:
Filter unblocking search ads and self-promotion

Language-specific:
AdGuard Russian,
RU AdList: Counters Custom filters: | `uBlock₀ filters – Annoyances (url: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/uBlockOrigin/uAssets/master/filters/annoyances.txt)`,
`AdGuard Mobile Ads filter (url: https://filters.adtidy.org/extension/chromium/filters/11.txt)`,
`AdGuard Tracking Protection filter (url: https://filters.adtidy.org/extension/chromium/filters/3.txt)`,
`AdGuard URL Tracking filter (url: https://filters.adtidy.org/extension/chromium/filters/17.txt)`,
`AdGuard Base filter (Optimized) (url: https://filters.adtidy.org/extension/chromium/filters/2_optimized.txt)`,
`YouTube Neuter (url: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/mchangrh/yt-neuter/main/yt-neuter.txt)`,
`I don't care about cookies (url: https://www.i-dont-care-about-cookies.eu/abp/)`,
`AdGuard DNS filter (url: https://filters.adtidy.org/mac_v2/filters/15.txt)`,
`AdGuard Annoyances filter (url: https://filters.adtidy.org/mac_v2/filters/14.txt)` Browsing Security: | enabled Browsing Security statistics: | disabled Userscripts: | `AdGuard Extra (url: https://userscripts.adtidy.org/release/adguard-extra/1.0/adguard-extra.user.js)`
`AdGuard Popup Blocker (url: https://userscripts.adtidy.org/release/popup-blocker/2.5/popupblocker.user.js)`
`AdGuard Assistant (url: https://userscripts.adtidy.org/release/assistant/4.3/assistant.user.js)` Userstyles: | disabled Other extensions used: | `DuckduckGo privacy essentials, Noir, Raindrop.io, Font Ninja` ### Issue configuration [Import](https://reports.adguard.com/settings/import.html?product_type=mac&product_version=2.17.3.2020+release&system_version=MacOS+26.0.1+%28Build+25A362%29&browser=safari&filters=1.2.3.4.10.11.17.18.19.20.21.22.101.118.123.204.207.208.212.241.250&custom_filters=uBlock%25E2%2582%2580%2520filters%2520%25E2%2580%2593%2520Annoyances%2520%28url%253A%2520https%253A%252F%252Fraw.githubusercontent.com%252FuBlockOrigin%252FuAssets%252Fmaster%252Ffilters%252Fannoyances.txt%29%252CAdGuard%2520Mobile%2520Ads%2520filter%2520%28url%253A%2520https%253A%252F%252Ffilters.adtidy.org%252Fextension%252Fchromium%252Ffilters%252F11.txt%29%252CAdGuard%2520Tracking%2520Protection%2520filter%2520%28url%253A%2520https%253A%252F%252Ffilters.adtidy.org%252Fextension%252Fchromium%252Ffilters%252F3.txt%29%252CAdGuard%2520URL%2520Tracking%2520filter%2520%28url%253A%2520https%253A%252F%252Ffilters.adtidy.org%252Fextension%252Fchromium%252Ffilters%252F17.txt%29%252CAdGuard%2520Base%2520filter%2520%28Optimized%29%2520%28url%253A%2520https%253A%252F%252Ffilters.adtidy.org%252Fextension%252Fchromium%252Ffilters%252F2_optimized.txt%29%252CYouTube%2520Neuter%2520%28url%253A%2520https%253A%252F%252Fraw.githubusercontent.com%252Fmchangrh%252Fyt-neuter%252Fmain%252Fyt-neuter.txt%29%252CI%2520don%27t%2520care%2520about%2520cookies%2520%28url%253A%2520https%253A%252F%252Fwww.i-dont-care-about-cookies.eu%252Fabp%252F%29%252CAdGuard%2520DNS%2520filter%2520%28url%253A%2520https%253A%252F%252Ffilters.adtidy.org%252Fmac_v2%252Ffilters%252F15.txt%29%252CAdGuard%2520Annoyances%2520filter%2520%28url%253A%2520https%253A%252F%252Ffilters.adtidy.org%252Fmac_v2%252Ffilters%252F14.txt%29&dns_servers=https%3A%2F%2Fdns.quad9.net%2Fdns-query%2Chttps%3A%2F%2Fcloudflare-dns.com%2Fdns-query&userscripts=AdGuard%2520Extra%2520%28url%253A%2520https%253A%252F%252Fuserscripts.adtidy.org%252Frelease%252Fadguard-extra%252F1.0%252Fadguard-extra.user.js%29%252C%250AAdGuard%2520Popup%2520Blocker%2520%28url%253A%2520https%253A%252F%252 comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).
